Swift Warsaw 1 aftermath

01 Aug 2014

So we met yesterday at Macoscope HQ for Swift Warsaw #1 event. And it went great! I would like to thank all for coming. It was really great to meet such a big crowd of Swifters and to-be-Swifters :) Hope our community will grow even further, see you at our next meetup (TBA soon)! üí¨üç∫üëç
